dcterms:creator: S. Song
S. P. Lichtenberg
J. Xiao
dcterms:description: A RGB-D scene understanding benchmark suite containing 10,335 RGB-D scene images, including 3,784 Kinect v2 images, 1,159 Intel RealSense images, 1,449 Kinect v1 images, 554 Kinect v1 images from the Berkeley B3DODataset, and 3,389 Asus Xtion images.
dcterms:title: SUNRGBD Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. K. Nathan Silberman
Derek Hoiem
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1,449 images organized into 10 scene categories, used for indoor segmentation and support inference from RGB-D images.
dcterms:title: NYU Depth Dataset V2
